SELECT T1.EMP_ID as empId, T1.EMP_CNM as empCnm, T1.EMP_CPNM as empCpnm, T4.ORG_SNM as deptNm, T3.POS_SNAME as posNm, T1.START_DATE as startDate, (SELECT DIFF_SHORT_NAME FROM SYS_CODE_MST WHERE DIFF_NO = T1.EMP_SEX AND TYPE_ID = 'SEX' AND SUB_SYS = 'EMP') AS empSex, (SELECT DIFF_SHORT_NAME FROM SYS_CODE_MST WHERE DIFF_NO = T1.EMP_STATUS_ID AND TYPE_ID = 'STATUS' AND SUB_SYS = 'EMP') AS empStatusNm, T5.DIFF_SHORT_NAME as empStateNm, (SELECT CONCAT(S.DISP_SEQ, T3.DISP_SEQ) FROM SYS_CODE_MST S WHERE S.SUB_SYS = 'EMP' AND S.TYPE_ID='POS_TYPE' AND S.DIFF_NO=T3.POS_TYPE_ID) AS posSEQ FROM EMP_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN EMP_STAFF_POS T2 ON T1.EMP_ID = T2.EMP_ID
AND T2.MAIN_POS_FLG = '1' LEFT JOIN EMP_POS T3 ON T2.POS_ID = T3.POS_ID LEFT JOIN EMP_ORG_INFO T4 ON T1.CHARGE_ORG_ID = T4.ORG_ID, SYS_CODE_MST T5 WHERE T5.DIFF_NO = T1.EMP_STATE_ID AND T5.TYPE_ID = 'STATE' AND T5.SUB_SYS = 'EMP' AND T5.PRO2 = '1'
T1.CHARGE_ORG_ID IN(SELECT ORG_ID FROM EMP_ORG_INFO WHERE ORG_LEV LIKE CONCAT((SELECT TRIM(TRAILING '0' FROM ORG_LEV) FROM EMP_ORG_INFO WHERE ORG_ID = #changeOrgId#),'%'))
T3.POS_TYPE_ID = #posTypeId#
T2.POS_ID = #posId#
T1.EMP_STATUS_ID = #empStatusId#
T1.EMP_STATE_ID = #empStateId#
T1.START_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#startYear#,'%')
ORDER BY posSEQ,T4.ORG_ID,T1.EMP_ID
